welcome.title: Welcome to Memati Editor!
welcome.message:
Hello! ğŸ‘‹

Welcome to this interactive guide designed to help you use your editor like a pro.

ğŸš€ In this tour you will discover:
â€¢ Hidden powers of the interface
â€¢ Lightning-fast coding techniques
â€¢ Project management tips

Let's start if you are ready!
tips: You can move the tutorial window to a comfortable corner of the screen.

menus.title: Menus and Commands
menus.message:
This is the center of everything.

You can access everything from file operations to theme settings here.

ğŸ’¡ You can save time by learning shortcuts (e.g. Ctrl+N) from menus.

file_explorer.title: File Explorer
file_explorer.message:
Your projects live here.

View your files in a tree structure. Double click to open/close folders.

ğŸ¯ Task: Examine the 'File Explorer' in the left panel.
tips: You can open a new folder with Ctrl+Shift+O.
Use Ctrl+B to hide the panel.

image_viewer.title: Image Viewer
image_viewer.message:
Your editor can now open image files too!

Supported formats: PNG, JPG, JPEG, BMP, GIF.

ğŸ¯ Task: Open an image file from the file explorer.
tips: Use the mouse wheel to zoom in/out.
Navigate within the image using arrow keys.

new_tab.title: A New Beginning
new_tab.message:
Open a clean sheet to start coding.

ğŸ¯ Task: Create a new tab using Ctrl+N or from the File menu.
tips: You can change the order of tabs by dragging them.

editor_area.title: Heart of the Editor
editor_area.message:
This is your playground.

âœ¨ Features:
â€¢ Auto Completion (Ctrl+Space)
â€¢ Syntax Highlighting
â€¢ Smart Indentation

ğŸ¯ Task: Type something random in the editor!
tips: Use Ctrl + Wheel to change font size.

minimap.title: Minimap (Code Map)
minimap.message:
Bird's eye view of your code.

Use the map on the right to navigate quickly in large files.

Keyboard Shortcut: Ctrl+M

multi_cursor.title: Multi-Cursor Magic
multi_cursor.message:
Edit multiple places at once!

ğŸ¯ Task: Hold 'Alt' key and click different places in the editor. Multiple cursors should blink!

smart_select.title: Smart Select (Ctrl+D)
smart_select.message:
Changing variable names has never been easier.

1. Select a word.
2. Press Ctrl+D to select the next occurrence.
3. Start typing; they will all change!

ğŸ¯ Task: Try this!

find_replace.title: Search and Destroy (Replace)
find_replace.message:
Powerful search engine at your command.

ğŸ¯ Task: Press Ctrl+F to open the search panel. It even has Regex support!

goto_line.title: Go to Line (Ctrl+G)
goto_line.message:
Don't get lost in long files.

ğŸ¯ Task: Press Ctrl+G to open the 'Go to Line' window.
tips: Teleport to any line by entering just the number.

terminal.title: Terminal Integration
terminal.message:
Run commands without leaving the editor.

ğŸ¯ Task: Open/close the terminal with Ctrl+` (Key above Tab).
tips: You can also close the terminal by typing 'exit'.

markdown.title: Markdown Preview
markdown.message:
Great feature for document writers.

If you are in a .md file, you can open live preview with Ctrl+Shift+V.

ğŸ’¡ Preview scrolls as you scroll in the editor (Sync Scroll).

zen_mode.title: Zen Mode
zen_mode.message:
When you just want to focus on code...

ğŸ§˜ Press Ctrl+K, then Z.

All panels hide, only code remains. Same to go back.

settings.title: Settings Menu
settings.message:
Customize your editor completely.

Use File > Settings menu to open settings.

ğŸ’¡ Tip: Use Ctrl+, shortcut for quick access.

theme.title: Themes
theme.message:
Choose the look that suits your eyes best.

You can choose from 9 different themes under Settings or View > Theme.
tips: We recommend 'Dracula' or 'Dark' themes for night work.
